channel.title: ~*~help!~*~
channel.description: Hey, every time I try to play a server it always says error connecting to server. You may just say "the server is down" but this happens when i know my friend is on the server when i get a message saying error connecting to server. This has been happening for a long long long long time and i can only play servers when i go to a friends house. lol. This problem has been happening after i tried to make my own server. I do not wanna make my own server now. I just want this problem fixed so i can play any server i want. If anyone could help that would be great and very much appreciated. Thanks. EDIT: Error connecting to server happens on webclients, whenever i download a client it says java is not recognized has an internal or external command/

item.title: ~*~help!~*~
item.dc:creator: @banana_panda banana panda
item.description:
@banana_panda wrote:

EDIT: I turned off my firewall and i still cant connect.

Read full topic

item.title: ~*~help!~*~
item.dc:creator: @str8golden str8golden
item.description:
@str8golden wrote:

firewall off… use a antivirus firewall cuz your firewall is blocking all incoming packets data from ports 43594…

Read full topic

item.description:
@server868 wrote:

a problem with your firewall?
